Subskills.name: Hollow Fangs
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of poison projectiles.

Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by poison nova.

Subskills.description: Instead of releasing projectiles poison nova instead causes an explosion centered around the necromancer dealing increased damage based on projectile amount.

Subskills.name: Embrace the Venom
Subskills.description: Increases the poisoned amount when dealing damage with poison nova.

Subskills.name: Conjurer's Might
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of poison nova.

Subskills.name: Venom's Reach
Subskills.description: Chance to spread poison to nearby monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Weakening Infection
Subskills.description: Chance to reduce targets damage dealt on hit.

Subskills.name: Down with the Sickness
Subskills.description: Chance to slow and inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.description: Cast a poison nova from all nearby poisoned enemies with increased damage based on poisoned. Poison nova now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Amplifying Mark
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Overwhelming Presence
Subskills.description: Increases the size of poison projectiles.

Subskills.name: Toxic Twist
Subskills.description: Poison nova projectiles now orbit outwards with increased duration.

Subskills.name: Virulent Blink
Subskills.description: Teleport to cast location hexing enemies on hit.

Subskills.name: Center of Epidemy
Subskills.description: Poison nova projectiles have a chance to return to the necromancer dealing damage and increasing the necromancers poison damage on return.
